short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy quick access to your favorite social, shopping, and entertainment sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SearchThisAll is a search-focused extension that offers a new tab search that is simple and fast.
Enjoy getting a fast response to your query, and easy-to-use search functionality.
By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to install the SearchThisAll extension, set the Chrome™ new tab search to SearchThisAll, and to the Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.

Terms of Use: https://www.searchthisall.com/terms-of-use

Privacy Policy: https://www.searchthisall.com/privacy-policy

The SearchThisAll extension sets your new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing.
You may uninstall the extension at any time.

To remove our extension from Chrome:
1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings.”
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions.”
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall.
5) To remove the extension, click on the "Remove" button, which is to the right of the "Details" button (for the extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. 
The extension should now be removed from your browser.

For assistance from our customer service team, please email us at support+searchthisall@nonline-search.com
